original_text: but the entrails and the legs he shall wash with water. And the priest shall offer all of it and burn it on the altar; it is a burnt offering, a food offering with a pleasing aroma to the Lord.
korean_text: 그 내장과 그 정강이를 물로 씻을 것이요 제사장은 그 전부를 가져다가 제단 위에서 불살라 번제를 드릴지니 이는 화제라 여호와께 향기로운 냄새니라

sentences.original_text: but the entrails and the legs he shall wash with water.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 내장과 다리를 물로 씻을 것이니라.

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall offer all of it
and burn it on the altar;
with a pleasing aroma to the Lord.
